item.title: Styleguide
item.description: Local styles for a happier development

item.title: About
item.description: I am Jitachi, a product designer made of curiosity, stubbornness, and a hint of foolishness, per Professor Utonium's words. I grew up with ultra strong and relentless kids traveling on clouds with monkey tails that would make them go nuts. Of course I had a great example of what was expected from me. I had to go monkey nuts be great. Work Experience Founding Designer at Railway / 2021 - (Current) Senior Designer at Rainforest / 2020 - 2021 Founding Designer at Kong, Inc / 2015 - 2020 Misc I like Japan.
